attributes.action: Protect and promote the National Media Museum in Bradford from the V&A raid.
attributes.background: The Science Museum Group propose to transfer 400,000 items to the V&A in London from the National Media Museum in Bradford, cancel the Bradford Film Festival and rename the museum.  This assault on culture in the regions should be resisted and we demand that the proposals be abandoned.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Science Museum Group, which is operationally independent.
